html:
Feb 4 (Reuters) -

  • AMAZON IS EXPLORING AN OFFER FOR PELOTON AND IS SPEAKING WITH ADVISERS ABOUT WHETHER AND HOW TO PROCEED - PERSON FAMILIAR WITH THE MATTER

  • PELOTON BECAME AWARE OF AMAZON'S INTEREST AND IS CONSIDERING ITS NEXT STEPS - PERSON FAMILIAR WITH THE MATTER

  • PELOTON HAS NOT YET DECIDED WHETHER IT WILL EXPLORE A SALE - PERSON FAMILIAR WITH THE MATTER

Further company coverage: PTON.O
